newsitem.title: INDIA: India September castor down, but spot firm.
newsitem.headline: India September castor down, but spot firm.

text.p: Castorseed September delivery fell to 1,147/1,148 rupees per quintal from 1,151 rupees on fresh speculative offerings, dealers said.
"Technically market was overbought and light profit-taking trimmed recent gains but undercurrent was firm on reports of a firm tendency in the spot prices," one operator said.
"Shippers are short and covering by them prompted buoyancy in the spot market," he added.
In the Gujarat region prices of spot castorseed lifted by 3/4 rupees at 231/232 rupees per 20 kg.
In Bombay groundnut oil slid by 1/2 rupees at 372/373 rupees per 10 kg amid sluggish month-end local demand. In Rajkot spot groundnut oil was steady at 599/600 rupees per 15 kg.
Imported palm-oil was quiet at 252 rupees per 10 kg for ready delivery while traders quoted August delivery at 251 rupees and September delivery at 250 rupees per 10 kg.
